#include<stdio.h>
//#include<conio.h>
int main()
{
int turn1=0,turn2;
scanf("%d",&turn2);
while(turn1++ < turn2)
{
  int num;
  scanf("%d",&num);
 // float k= (float)(num-1)/4;
 // printf("%f %f",k,k-(int)k);
   if(num%4==1 || num==2)
   printf("YES\n");
   else
   printf("NO\n");           
}   // getch();
return 0;
}
